Title: Ādāb-i khaṭṭ

Title: Risālah fī z̤arb; Author is unknown.

Title: Risālah-ʾi khaṭṭ
Subject: Fountain pens $v Early works to 1800|~|Calligraphy $v Early works to 1800|~|Paper $v Early works to 1800
Name.repository: University of California, Los Angeles. Library. Department of Special Collections
Source: Caro Minasian Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts, box 52, 362
Description.abstract: This collection is an instruction manual written in mas̲navī form on paper quality, which regions produce the best paper, calligraphy pens and how to care for them and colors as well as on the art of calligraphy.
Description.citation: Muḥammad Taqī Dānish-pazhūh, Fihrist-i Nushahhā-yi khaṭṭī, daftar 11 & 12 (Ṭihrān: Intishārāt-i Dānishgāh-i Ṭihrān, 1039 AH), p. 672.

Title: Bahr (?) al-ansāb; (2) Assuming DP means "Baḥr al-ansāb," a treatise on the geneaology of major Shi'ite figures. *Need to check again. Ending missing.
